name: Aro.
description:
Bitsy entry for Metaparadox 's  #AroJam2022 (March) from an AroAce creator!

Aromantic: a person who experiences little to no romantic attraction, a lack of romantic attraction to any gender.

it is So. Damn. Easy. to dwell on the negatives of being an Aromantic teenager, but it doesn't mean you're doomed!! so this story is a chance to chat about the difficulties of forming complex relationships wrapped in a fictitious story surrounding some personal experiences.
+ I'm hiding half of what the game looks like via selective screenshots, you gotta play to count all the ducks!
+ And there's a cool sprite at the end made of 152 unique 8x8 tiles yoyo ~+
It has a happy ending! :3 

3-4 min dialogue-focused walk through some familiar places, interact with pink sprites <3
